section1.title: Close SPL Token Accounts
section1.content: Select the token accounts you want to close. Each closed account will return about 0.002 SOL.

section2.title: Get SOL Back
section2.content: After closing, you'll receive 90% of the rent, and we'll keep 10% as a service fee.

section3.title: What is Rent?
section3.content: On Solana, each token account requires a small amount of SOL as rent. When you close these accounts, you can reclaim this SOL.
